title: Temperature of steel blocks in thermal equilibrium

content.prompt: Two blocks of steel, the first of mass 1 kg and the second of mass 2 kg, are in thermal equilibrium with a third block of aluminum of mass 2 kg that has a temperature of 400 K. What are the respective temperatures of the first and second steel blocks?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
